text: Homes on Hawtree Creek in Howard BeachHawtree Creek is a small saltwater creek that empties into Jamaica Bay in Queens, New York. The creek separates the neighborhoods of Hamilton Beach and Howard Beach. In the early 1900s, a canal was dug at the southern end of the creek to create Hawtree Basin. During colonial times, fishermen would build fishing shacks along its banks. ==References== ==External links== * West Hamilton Beach Category:Rivers of Queens, New York Category:Rivers of New York (state)
title: Hawtree Creek
